title: Grasshopper
summaries: The Grasshopper is a type of critter that can be found when destroying grass plants. The Grasshopper has only 5 health and no defense, and can be damaged by other enemies and players.

The Grasshopper can be caught with any Bug Net to be carried around in the inventory and released later, or crafted into animated decorative furniture (Grasshopper Cage). Once crafted, the Grasshopper cannot be released again, unless the furniture item is de-crafted via Shimmer(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions).
The Grasshopper can be used as <linked>bait</linked> for <linked>fishing</linked>, with 10% bait power.

The Grasshopper can be spawned by the <linked>Grasshopper Statue</linked>, however statue-spawned critters cannot be caught with any Bug Net, and will disappear in a puff of smoke when the player attempts to do so.

On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, there is a 1/400 (0.25%) chance for a Gold Grasshopper to spawn in place of an ordinary one.
